title: A sermon preached before his Maiestie, on Sunday the XIX. of Iune, at White-Hall Appointed to be preached at the opening of the Parliament. By the Bishop of S. Dauids.
author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.
publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiesty,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
